realme-desc: Allows verifying URLs used on user pages.
realme-preference-error-not-http: URL $1 must use either http:// or https:// as the protocol instead of $2.
realme-preference-error-too-many: You may only specify {{PLURAL:$1|one URL|$1 URLs}}.
realme-preference-help: Please add one URL per line. When these URLs are used on your user page, matching <link rel="me"> [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTML_element HTML tags] will be added to the page, which some platforms (for example, Mastodon) use to mark profile links as verified.
